welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bukittinggi, a charming city known for its rich Minangkabau culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Selamat datang! (Welcome!)

restaurants.name: RM Family Benteng Indah
restaurants.description: RM Family Benteng Indah is a padangnese restaurant located in Bukittinggi.
restaurants.address: Jl. Yos Sudarso No. 4, Bukittinggi, Sumatera Barat

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut is a pizzeria located in Bukittinggi.
restaurants.address: Jl. Ahmad Yani No. 3-5, Bukittinggi, Sumatera Barat

restaurants.name: R.M Selamat Bukittinggi
restaurants.description: R.M Selamat Bukittinggi is a padangnese restaurant located in Bukittinggi.

restaurants.name: Mieso Yarsi
restaurants.description: Mieso Yarsi is a noodle restaurant located in Bukittinggi.
restaurants.address: Belakang Balok (belakang Yarsi), Bukittinggi, Sumatera Barat

restaurants.name: Simpang Raya
restaurants.description: Simpang Raya is a padangnese restaurant located in Bukit Tinggi.
restaurants.address: Jam Gadang, Bukit Tinggi, Sumatera Barat
